title: Hans Rey hops through the Evolution of the Mountain Bike in latest film from Shimano
content:
Mountain bikes have rapidly evolved over the years. The same could be said for trials legend Hans ‘No Way’ Rey. From jumping over people in trials demos, to traveling the world on epic adventures with riders like Danny MacAskill, Hans continues to keep us on the edge of our seat. While claiming he’ll never give

The post Hans Rey hops through the Evolution of the Mountain Bike in latest film from Shimano appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
